headline: The Trade Desk to Join the S&P 500 Index
summary: VENTURA, Calif., July 17, 2025--The Trade Desk, Inc. (NASDAQ: TTD), a leading global advertising technology company, will become a component of the S&P 500® Index, starting at the opening of trading on Friday, July 18.

headline: Can Retail Media be the Next Major Growth Driver for TTD After CTV?
summary: The Trade Desk bets on retail media as its next growth engine, building on CTV success and deepening ties with major retailers.

raw.headline: Can Retail Media be the Next Major Growth Driver for TTD After CTV?

headline: Dear Trade Desk Stock Fans, Mark Your Calendars for July 18
summary: Trade Desk is joining the S&P 500, a move that could spark a rally as index funds rebalance.

raw.headline: Dear Trade Desk Stock Fans, Mark Your Calendars for July 18
raw.summary: Trade Desk is joining the S&P 500, a move that could spark a rally as index funds rebalance.

headline: The Trade Desk Stock Soars on Inclusion in S&P 500. History Says This Will Happen Next.
summary: The Trade Desk stock advanced more than 7% on news that it would be added to the S&P 500 on July 18.  During the last decade, stocks have returned an average of 13.6% following their addition to the S&P 500.  The Trade Desk was recently ranked as a leader in ad tech software due to consistent growth and innovation.
